title: LeaveBuster PROBLEM
body: So today at 23:32 i've been wanting to play an RANKED game but suddenly my game kept crashing and i got the ziggs program openned and it said what i did before the game crashed, i clicked do not send and tried again, it didnt work. My team REMAKE'D in 3rd minute, the game put me to the main lobby of the game and was repairing itself, 4000MB to the end, so i waited about 10 minutes, everything repaired succesfully. i wanted to play a game a gain and i got a LEAVEBUSTER, please could somebody help me ?{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Regardless of your intent, disconnecting from a match negatively impacts *everyone* in the match. This happens to be a big reason as to why the system treats all disconnections equally and why we're unable to remove/modify Leaverbuster penalties.

If you encounter further issues with the Bugsplats you experienced before, let me know so we can troubleshoot the issue together. If you have any questions, let me know.
